channel.title: Jam on Pandaqi Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jam on Pandaqi Blog

item.title: Boltcorpse & Sons
item.description:
Welcome to my devlog for the video game Boltcorpse & Sons.

It will be quite brief, because it was for a very short game jam (The Jame Gam 33) and I had no time to actually track this diary while making the game. So I’m giving all my thoughts a few days after finishing the game and not touching it again.

item.title: Bombgoggles
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Bombgoggles. It will be a very brief one, because it’s a very short jam (it’s literally called the Mini Jam) and I can’t even use most of the time we do get. Nevertheless, I think through problems and ideas by writing in this devlog (like a diary), so I’m creating one anyway.

item.title: Bot Bouldering
item.description: Welcome to the devlog for one of my ideas for the GMTK Jam 2024. It was a mess, things weren’t working, and I’ll be documenting it all because it helps me think through the problems. Hopefully it’s fun/instructive for others to read too!

item.title: Druids in the Dark
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Druids in the Dark. It was made for a Game Jam (by PirateSoftware) in very little time, because I was too busy finishing other projects. That’s why the devlog will be quite short and the game idea isn’t as creative/experimental as I’d normally do. Nevertheless, I wanted to detail the general process.

item.title: Finside Out & Inside Sprout
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game jam called So you WANNA Jam!? 2024. The jam was held from August 3th to August 12th by the YouTuber/Game Developer Wannibe Manisha.

item.title: Sunbluck
item.description: Welcome to my devlog for the game Sunbluck. It was made for the Godot Wild Jam 72 in a few days, which is why this devlog will be rather brief. Nevertheless, I want to talk about the process, any interesting challenges or situations, and anything else that seems worth sharing.

item.title: Less is Store
item.description:
Welcome to the devlog for “Less is Store”. This game was created for the GoGodot Jam (iteration 4).

Originally, I made an entirely different idea for this game jam. But my laptop is old and broken, and that idea was 3D … so after a few days, it just gave up. It crashed all the time, out of nowhere. And even if it didn’t, it was just too slow and laggy to stay motivated and productive.

item.title: Windup Wizards
item.description: Alright, so, the GoGodot Jam 2 happened. I decided to participate. This was decided well in advance, and I scheduled my other projects around it.

item.title: Ho Ho Sombrero
item.description:
Welcome to my devlog for the game “Ho Ho Sombrero”

At the start of December, the “New Horizons” game jam came on my radar. Even though I’d already done two huge game jams in November, and wasn’t really looking to do another, the theme just resonated with me: make a game that’s positive and about new year’s resolutions.

item.title: Windowsilk
item.description:
Welcome to my devlog for the game Windowsilk

A local multiplayer game for 1-X players, playing spiders moving across an increasingly chaotic web, catching bugs and avoiding falling off their web.
